QuestData.Title: Mazu's Breath
QuestData.Description: Here to help, are ya? Well, first thing's first.$B$B<Arie rummages through her pockets for a moment before producing a small vial of glowing blue fluid.>$B$BHere it is! "Mazu's Breath." Cap'n's own formula.$B$BWhat? You thought I'd send you out to sea without a means of breathin'? I need deckhands, not corpses!$B$BDown the hatch with it, green. This'll give you a fighting chance out there on the shelf.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drink the Potion of Mazu's Breath.
QuestData.CompletionText: No, I don't have a "chaser!" Just drink it!

Objectives.Objective: Drink the Potion of Mazu's Breath
